translated: “The Victor named Padumuttara,🔽the receiver of offerings,
dwelt at that time in the Himalayas.
dwelt in a secluded place at that time;
the Leader of the World, who had recently arrived.
I approached the Leader of Men;
While he was entering into concentration,
the Great Seer Padumuttara, accepted it.
They made a sound of applause,
approached the Supreme One among Men;
While he was holding it in the sky,
The ascetic raised a parasol with a hundred spokes,
He will rule over the gods,
He will be a wheel-turning monarch.🔽Whatever womb he will enter,

original: Yaṁ yaṁ yoniṁ saṁsarati,🔽devattaṁ atha mānusaṁ;
analyzed: yam yam yonim sasarati  devattam atha mānusa

translated: He will be born in the open air,
With the clan name of Gotama,
He will be a teacher in the world.
When the Dispensation has been revealed,
I, at the age of eighteen,
In the Dispensation of the Sakyan’s Son.

original: Dandhā mayhaṁ gatī āsi,🔽paribhūto pure ahuṁ;
analyzed: dandhā mayham gatī āsi  paribhūtaḥ pure ahu
translated: My progress was slow,🔽In the past I was despised,
In the courtyard of the monastery,
I was anxious about the ascetic practice.
and taking me by the arm
he led me into the monastery.
Out of compassion for me the Teacher
and determine it to be at one side.”
I took it in my hands,
and I made a water lily garland;
I went to the end of everything;
Having fully understood all the pollutants
The six super knowledges are experienced,
the Buddha’s instruction has been done.”🔽Thus the venerable Cūḷapanthaka recited these verses.

original: Itthaṁ sudaṁ āyasmā cūḷapanthako thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.🔽Cūḷapanthakattherassāpadānaṁ catutthaṁ.
analyzed: ittham sudam āyasmā cūḷapanthakaḥ theraḥ imāḥ gāthāyaḥ abhāsittha ati 🔽cūḷapanthaka therassa apadānam catuttha
translated: The Elder Cūḷapanthaka’s Chapter is finished.
